/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures, painted in hues of red and beige, rise high into the sky, their windows reflecting the sunlight. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the scene. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. The image is bathed in the warm glow of a sunny day, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
